thread.title: Victoria Page
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Victoria Page

author: Victoria Page
title: Victoria Page
text:
I bought the Country Attire Women's Ivy Wax Jacket and could not be happier. The quality is superb and the fit is perfect. Pockets are a good size and perfectly placed. The lining is soft and warm, without having any extra padding.
The surprise find in one of the pockets for personalising my garment and the lapel pin were brilliant little touches from Country Attire who clearly know how to look after their customers. Very pleased.
